participant_1.background:
I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading.
I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium.
I've got a pretty big collection of old music records that I like to show my kids.
i have a masters degree.
I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family.

participant_2.background:
I make sure to spend time with my family after a long day of rehearsals.
my father was a famous actor.
i am bored of my maids.
i have always wanted a pot bellied pig.
My most interesting experience was when I met a famous person who was a passenger in one of my cabs.

content.text: Hello there! I'm a huge fan of old music. Do you like any old music?
I love old music too! My dad was a famous actor, so I grew up listening to all sorts of music from the 40s and 50s.
Wow! That's so cool! I've never met anyone with a famous parent before.
It's both a blessing and a curse. I'm always being compared to him, but it's also really cool to have a famous dad.
I can imagine! I bet it was fun to go to red carpets and stuff with him when you were younger.
It was! I got to meet a lot of cool people and see some amazing things.
Haha, thanks! I'm glad you think so.
Me too! So, what's your favorite old song?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say "My Funny Valentine" by Frank Sinatra.
Oh, that's a great song! I love that one too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read too. What are you reading right now?
I'm reading "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
Oh, that's a great book! I read it a few years ago.
I'm enjoying it so far! It's a little slow-paced, but it's really interesting.
Yeah, it is a little slow-paced, but it's worth it
